sys_script.name: Arrival and Destination Dates

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_938860_dream_boo_booking_task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Arrival and Destination Dates</name><order>200</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	if (current.u_departure_date < u_arrival_date) {
		gs.addErrorMessage('Arrival date must be later than the departure date');
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
})(current, previous);

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-20 10:25:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c66b69dd0753d110cd89f4218c1ed0f1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Arrival and Destination Dates</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="DREAM_BOOKING" source="x_938860_dream_boo">ed3ebf2b0747d110cd89f4218c1ed09d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DREAM_BOOKING">ed3ebf2b0747d110cd89f4218c1ed09d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c66b69dd0753d110cd89f4218c1ed0f1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-20 10:37:57</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c66b69dd0753d110cd89f4218c1ed0f1"/></record_update>
